tech_news.title: Tomb Raider's 2013 reboot just shadow dropped on Switch and Switch 2 consoles - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Aspyr and Crystal Dynamics just shadow dropped Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition on Switch and Switch 2.

tech_news.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 has plunged to a record low price - The Verge
tech_news.description: The Apple Watch Series 11 is $349.99 ($50 off) at Amazon. The Onn 4K Pro Streaming Device and Coway Airmega AP-1512HH is also on sale.

tech_news.description: The Analogue3D is the best way to play N64 games on a modern display.

tech_news.title: Microsoft is turning Windows into an ‘agentic OS,’ starting with the taskbar - The Verge
tech_news.description: Microsoft is adding AI agents to the Windows 11 taskbar. It’s all part of a broader push to transform Windows into an “agentic OS.”

tech_news.title: Snapchat rolls out ‘Topic Chats’ for public conversations - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: The social network says the new feature will let users chat about what’s happening in the world and across various communities, from Formula 1 to the reality TV show "Below Deck."
